author: cnbc.com
title: Twitter posts big numbers in the fourth quarter, shares soar
text:
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) _ Twitter Inc. (TWTR) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter net income of $91.1 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier.
The San Francisco-based company said it had profit of 12 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 19 cents per share.
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 14 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 14 cents per share.
The short messaging service posted revenue of $731.6 million in the period, which also topped Street forecasts. Eleven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $690.3 million.
Twitter shares have risen 12 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has increased 47 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on TWTR at https://www.zacks.com/ap/TWTR
